content: 5 *in ch3 space ch3 3dc ch3 4dc point *4fpdc 4bpdc decrease chain 1 skip the slip_stitch from previous round 4bpdc decrease ch1 4fpdc 4dc ch3 4dc* *repeat* slip_stitch into the top of the ch3 from beginning & fo ©2025 ashley maglich *round 5 - example pics* round 6 *in ch3 space 4sc 4fp ½ double_crochet 4sc in between the space of the bpdc decrease make a puff ©2025 ashley maglich *puff yo & pull up loop x6 & pull through all ch1 *4sc 4fp ½ double_crochet 4sc 4fp ½ double_crochet 4sc puff chain 1 4sc 4fp ½ double_crochet* repeat slip stitch into top of first single_crochet & fo *round 6 - example pics ©2025 ashley maglich round 7 *in point over the 4sc from previous round ch3 3dc ch3 4dc *skip 4 stitches & make a granny cluster 3dc skip 3 stitches & make a granny cluster on both sides of the puff from the previous round skip 4 stitches & make a granny cluster in point *over the 4sc from previous round* 4dc ch3 4dc repeat* slip_stitch into top of ch3 & fo ©2025 ashley maglich round 8 *in ch3 space make 4 single_crochet ch3 single_crochet in the space between 4dc from point & granny cluster ch2 single_crochet in the space between granny cluster repeat *ch2 single_crochet* until the 4dc at the point ch3 4sc into the ch3 space *ch3 over 4dc space ch2 over granny clusters slip_stitch into 1st single_crochet & fo ©2025 ashley maglich round 9 *in point over the 4sc ch3 2dc ch2 3dc single_crochet around ch3 from previous round ©2025 ashley maglich 2 fpdc decrease around the 2 middle double_crochet from the previous cluster below single_crochet around the ch2 single_crochet around the ch2 on the other side of the single_crochet from the previous round single_crochet on both sides of the single_crochet between clusters from last row fpdc around the middle double_crochet from the cluster below single_crochet around ch2 skip single_crochet from previous round & single_crochet around ch2 so for this round you are putting a single_crochet around the chain spots from previous round & fpdc around the middle double_crochet in the clusters 2 fpdc decrease around the 2 middle double_crochet in the 4dc clusters pattern is 3dc ch2 3dc single_crochet fpdc 2 decrease single_crochet single_crochet fpdc single_crochet single_crochet fpdc single_crochet single_crochet fpdc single_crochet single_crochet fpdc single_crochet single_crochet fpdc 2 decrease single_crochet repeat slip_stitch into top of ch3 & fo ©2025 ashley maglich round 9 - example pics ©2025 ashley maglich round 10 *start in the ch2 ch2 3 ½ double_crochet ch2 3 ½ double_crochet *½ double_crochet in each stitch down to the valley 12 ½ double_crochet slip_stitch in the middle of the 2sc from previous round ½ double_crochet back up 11 ½ double_crochet * 3 ½ double_crochet ch2 3 ½ double_crochet repeat* slip_stitch into the top of the 1st ½ double_crochet & fo pe ©2025 ashley maglich *now follow the pattern round 1-10 and make another star you will need 2 stars to make
